quotes.quote: A thing long expected takes the form of the unexpected when at last it comes
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Short words are best and the old words when short are best of all
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: I have done my best: that is about all the philosophy of living one needs
quotes.author: Lin-yutang

quotes.quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Give thanks for the rain of life that propels us to reach new horizons
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We all have problems. The way we solve them is what makes us different
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret to a rich life is to have more beginnings than endings
quotes.author: Dave Weinbaum

quotes.quote: It is only when the mind and character slumber that the dress can be seen
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Reviewing what you have learned and learning anew, you are fit to be a teacher
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page
quotes.author: Augustinus Sanctus
